remarks: The edge function of an undirected multigraph is a function into unordered pairs of vertices.  Version of ~ umgraf without explicitly specified domain of the edge function (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.)
statement:
umgraf2 $p |- ( V UMGrph E -> E : dom E --> { x e. ( ~P V \ { (/) } ) | ( # ` x ) <_ 2 } ) $.
$d E x $.
$d V x $.
